description:
Prometheus for system metrics. 
Load, CPU, RAM, network, process ...

targets.expr: sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="$host"}[$interval])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="$host"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="$host"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="$host"})

seriesOverrides.instance: Processes blocked waiting for I/O to complete

targets.legendFormat: Processes blocked waiting for I/O to complete

panels.description: Number of TCP sockets in state inuse.
panels.title: TCP In Use

title: TiDB Cluster - node
